full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SEMS DANG SEMS BYUNG GI TSUL GSAL BAR STON PA BLO GSAL MGUL RGYAN CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @051A *, ,(CES SEMS DANG SEMS BYUNG GI TSUL GSAL BAR STON PA BLO GSAL MGUL RGYAN CES BYA BA 'DI NI, MDO SNGAGS RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA DKA' CHEN BLO BZANG BZANG PO SOGS DON GNYER CAN MANG POS YANG DANG YANG DU BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, DON GYI SLAD DU MTSAN NAS SMOS TE RJE BTZUN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG YE SHES DPAL BZANG PO'I SKU DRIN LAS RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE'I SGOR RAB TU BYUNG ZHING CHOS TSUL 'DI DAG RNA LAM DU CUNG ZAD THOS PA DANG, RJE BTZUN BLA MA GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG CHEN PO BLO BZANG RNAM RGYAL DANG, YONGS RDZOGS BSTAN PA'I MNGA' BDAG RJE BTZUN BYAMS PA'I MTSAN CAN GNYIS KYI SKU DRIN LAS BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I MAN NGAG LEGS PAR THOB PA'I SNYOM LAS PA YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, MNGON PA KUN BTUS RTZA 'GREL LA GZHI BYAS, RJE YAB SRAS KYI LEGS BSHAD KYIS BRGYAN TE BAL BOD MTSAMS KYI DBEN GNAS BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG THUB PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE SGO KUN NAS 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
